channel.title: lignin on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in lignin on funPlantGenes

item.title: ArPEC25
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: ST47_g1734 Gene Symbol: ArPEC25 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Description: ArPEC25 inhibits the transactivation of CaβLIM1a by interfering with its DNA-binding ability, resulting in negative regulation of the phenylpropanoid pathway and decreased levels of intermediates of lignin biosynthesis, thereby suppressing lignin production.

item.title: BdCAD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g06480 Gene Symbol: BdCAD1 Gene Name: cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Disrupting the cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 1 gene (BdCAD1) leads to altered lignification and improved saccharification in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: BpNAC012
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BpNAC012 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor Genome: Species: Betula platyphylla Functional Descriptions: Gain- and loss-of-function analyses revealed that the transcript level of BpNAC012 was positively associated with salt and osmotic stress tolerance.

item.title: CmCAD3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C003735 Gene Symbol: CmCAD3 Gene Name: Cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Lignin synthesized by CmCAD2 and CmCAD3 in oriental melon (Cucumis melo L.

item.title: CmHLB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHLB Gene Name: HLH PROTEIN INVOLVED IN LIGNIN BIOSYNTHESIS Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmMYB15 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 15 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of CmMYB15 provides chrysanthemum resistance to aphids by regulating the biosynthesis of lignin.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsAAP2 knockout lines exhibited arrested development of root meristem, which then caused the delayed initiation of lateral root and the inhibition of root elongation.

item.title: CsCAD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g20590 Gene Symbol: CsCAD Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The transcript levels of lignin biosynthetic genes, namely, hydroxycinnamoyl transferase (CsHCT, CAP ID: Cs1g14450), cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase (CsCAD, CAP ID: Cs1g20590) and caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase (CsCCoAOMT, CAP ID: Cs4g13430), were elevated in the leaves of the transgenic lines after mock inoculation and Xcc infection.

item.title: CsCCoAOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs4g13430 Gene Symbol: CsCCoAOMT Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The transcript levels of lignin biosynthetic genes, namely, hydroxycinnamoyl transferase (CsHCT, CAP ID: Cs1g14450), cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase (CsCAD, CAP ID: Cs1g20590) and caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase (CsCCoAOMT, CAP ID: Cs4g13430), were elevated in the leaves of the transgenic lines after mock inoculation and Xcc infection.

item.title: CsHCT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g14450 Gene Symbol: CsHCT Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsHCT,lignin biosynthetic genes, namely, hydroxycinnamoyl transferase.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GWHTACFB019013 Gene Symbol: CsPAT1 Gene Name: phytochrome A signal transduction 1 Genome: TPIA2 (http://tpia.

item.title: CsREV
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsREV Gene Name: REVOLUTA Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsREV predominantly localized in the cambium and xylem, and its expression pattern overlapped with the deposition of cellulose and lignin in leaf veins.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g01140 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0101400 Gene Symbol: CYP93G1 OsFNSII Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FtCOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FtPinG0009454400 Gene Symbol: FtCOMT1 Gene Name: caffeoyl-CoA OMT1 Genome: Pinku1 reference genome Species: Fagopyrum tataricum Functional Descriptions: Genome-wide association studies identified robust associations between FtCOMT1 and the accumulation of S lignin in seed hull.

item.title: GbCML45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_D04G005070 Gene Symbol: GbCML45 Gene Name: calmodulin-like 45 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Positive roles of the Ca2+ sensors GbCML45 and GbCML50 in improving cotton Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: Gh4CL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gh4CL3 Gene Name: Cotton 4-coumarate-CoA ligase 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton 4-coumarate-CoA ligase 3 (Gh4CL3) enhanced plant resistance to Verticillium dahliae by promoting jasmonic acid signaling-mediated vascular lignification and metabolic flux.

item.title: Gh4CL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gh4CL7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Gh4CL7-silencing cotton plants showed more sensitive to drought stress, probably due to decreased relative water content (RWC), chlorophyll content and antioxidative enzyme activity, increased stomatal aperture, and the contents of malondialdehyde (MDA) and hydrogen peroxide (H2O2).

item.title: GhLAC4-3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D04G1418 Gene Symbol: GhLAC4-3 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: These results suggest that GhLAC4-3 might enhance aphid resistance by regulating lignin biosynthesis in cotton.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsWRKY13 Gene Symbol: GWHTACFB001163 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWRKY13 acts as a negative regulator of lignin biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: IbLEA14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbLEA14 Gene Name: Late embryogenesis abundant 14 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Sweetpotato late embryogenesis abundant 14 (IbLEA14) gene influences lignification and increases osmotic- and salt stress-tolerance of transgenic calli.

item.title: IbMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbMYB1 Gene Name: MYB domain protein 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Interaction of small RNA–8105 and the intron of IbMYB1 RNA regulates IbMYB1 family genes through secondary siRNAs and DNA methylation after wounding.

item.title: IbpreproHypSys
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbpreproHypSys Gene Name: hydroxyproline-rich preprosystemin Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: The expression of IbpreproHypSys, encoding the precursor of IbHypSys, was induced in sweet potato (Ipomoea batatas cv.

item.title: JrLAC12–1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrLAC12–1 Gene Name: laccase-12-like Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrLAC12–1, JrLAC12–2 and JrLAC16 showed a significant change in expression at the lignification stage.

item.title: LrNAC35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0012070 Gene Symbol: LrNAC35 Gene Name: NAC domain-containing protein 35-like Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: Ectopic overexpression of LrNAC35 alters flowering time in petunia.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: McMYB4 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdARF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000886637 Gene Symbol: MdARF1 Gene Name: ARF domain class transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The miR7125-MdARF1 module enhances the resistance of apple to Colletotrichum gloeosporioides by promoting lignin synthesis in response to salicylic acid signalling.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdCCR Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdSND1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1121400 Gene Symbol: MdSND1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Dual role of MdSND1 in the biosynthesis of lignin and in signal transduction in response to salt and osmotic stress in apple.

item.title: MdWRKY75e
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000263768 Gene Symbol: MdWRKY75e Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdWRKY75e enhances resistance to Alternaria alternata in Malus domestica.

item.title: MeHB16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeHB16 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine-zipper I (HD-Zip I) TF Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MeKIN10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeKIN10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MsNST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsNST1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results suggest that MsNST1 affects lignin synthesis in alfalfa.

item.title: PbbZIP48

item.title: PbMYB308
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB308 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Description: PbMYB308 negatively regulates stone cell lignin synthesis by binding to PbMYB61 to form a dimer that cannot activate PbLAC1 expression.

item.title: PbMYB61
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB61 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Description: PbMYB308 negatively regulates stone cell lignin synthesis by binding to PbMYB61 to form a dimer that cannot activate PbLAC1 expression.

item.title: PbrARF13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr016201.1 Gene Symbol: PbrARF13 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Auxin inhibits lignin and cellulose biosynthesis in stone cells of pear fruit via the PbrARF13-PbrNSC-PbrMYB132 transcriptional regulatory cascade.

item.title: PbrMYB132
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr038701.2 Gene Symbol: PbrMYB132 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Auxin inhibits lignin and cellulose biosynthesis in stone cells of pear fruit via the PbrARF13-PbrNSC-PbrMYB132 transcriptional regulatory cascade.

item.title: PbrMYB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr017813.1 Gene Symbol: PbrMYB24 Gene Name: Genome: pear genome database (http://peargenome.

item.title: PbrNSC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr038584.1 Gene Symbol: PbrNSC Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Auxin inhibits lignin and cellulose biosynthesis in stone cells of pear fruit via the PbrARF13-PbrNSC-PbrMYB132 transcriptional regulatory cascade.

item.title: PdPFD2.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.008G153900 Gene Symbol: PdPFD2.2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus deltoides Functional Descriptions: PdPFD2.

item.title: PrCCoAOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCCoAOMT Gene Name: caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Pinus radiata Functional Descriptions: A cDNA clone encoding the lignin-related enzyme caffeoyl CoA 3-O-methyltransferase (CCoAOMT) was isolated from a Pinus radiata cDNA library derived from differentiating xylem.

item.title: PtaRHE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtaRHE1 Gene Name: RING-H2 ATL family protein1 Genome: C9D740 Species: Populus tremula × Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PtaRHE1, a Populus tremula × Populus alba RING-H2 protein of the ATL family, has a regulatory role in secondary phloem fibre development.

item.title: PtGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtGT1 Gene Name: putative glycosyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of a putative poplar glycosyltransferase gene, PtGT1, in tobacco increases lignin content and causes early flowering.

item.title: PtomtAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtomtAPX Gene Name: mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: PtomtAPX, a mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase, plays an important role in maintaining the redox balance of Populus tomentosa Carr.

item.title: PtrbHLH186
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.018G083700 Gene Symbol: PtrbHLH186 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Overexpressing PtrbHLH186 in Populus trichocarpa resulted in retarded plant growth, increased guaiacyl lignin, a higher proportion of smaller stem vessels and strong drought-tolerant phenotypes.

item.title: PuRBOHF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuRBOHF Gene Name: respiratory burst oxidase homolog Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: Production of reactive oxygen species by PuRBOHF is critical for stone cell development in pear fruit.

item.title: PvMYB4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvMYB4a Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Effects of overexpression of PvMYB4 in transgenic tobacco and switchgrass suggest that the gene is functionally orthologous to AtMYB4 and ZmMYB31.

item.title: PvMYB4b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvMYB4b Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Effects of overexpression of PvMYB4 in transgenic tobacco and switchgrass suggest that the gene is functionally orthologous to AtMYB4 and ZmMYB31.

item.title: PvMYB4c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvMYB4c Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Effects of overexpression of PvMYB4 in transgenic tobacco and switchgrass suggest that the gene is functionally orthologous to AtMYB4 and ZmMYB31.

item.title: PvMYB4d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvMYB4d Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Effects of overexpression of PvMYB4 in transgenic tobacco and switchgrass suggest that the gene is functionally orthologous to AtMYB4 and ZmMYB31.

item.title: PvSAMS1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.9NG074700 Gene Symbol: PvSAMS1a Gene Name: S-adenosylmethionine synthase Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of PvSAMS impairs S-adenosyl-L-methionine and lignin biosynthesis, and improves cell wall digestibility in switchgrass.

item.title: SWAM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g47590 Gene Symbol: SWAM1 Gene Name: SECONDARY WALL ASSOCIATED MYB1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: SWAM1 overexpression (SWAM-OE) lines had greater above-ground biomass with only a slight change in flowering time while SWAM1 dominant repressor (SWAM1-DR) plants were severely dwarfed with a striking reduction in lignin of sclerenchyma fibers and stem epidermal cell length.
